title: UFC's Megan Olivi to be sideline reporter for Falcons-Cardinals game on FOX
text:
Megan Olivi is trading in cageside for an NFL sideline this weekend.

A FOX Sports official told MMA Junkie on Friday that Olivi, the veteran host and reporter for the UFC, will serve as the sideline reporter for Sunday’s game between the Atlanta Falcons and Arizona Cardinals at University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Ariz.

“I’m so excited to be back again for NFL on FOX,” Olivi said. “It’s an honor to join the team for my second season. I’m really looking forward to getting on the field and contributing. Last season was such a great experience, and I can’t wait to see what this year has in store.”

Last season, Olivi worked three NFL on FOX games. It’s uncertain how many more games she’ll work the rest of this season.
description: Megan Olivi, the veteran UFC host and reporter, is trading in cageside for an NFL sideline this weekend.
